Sinopse: Five years after the brutal events that befell Skye and Beth inside Old Saint Leopold's Hospital, the two survivors continue to pick up the shattered pieces of their lives. With news of the past violent events resurfacing in the press and media, the two ladies face dealing with those ugly memories all over again. Soon, though, the events become more than just memories as Skye and Beth are hurled into another fight for survival against some very real demons from their past that are hell-bent on destroying them and everything that they hold dear.
